name: Time and Eternity
description:
Time and Eternity is a RPG game developed by Satelight, Imageepoch and Image Epoch. It came out on 11-10-2012. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Time and Eternity is available on PlayStation 3.
It was produced by Kei Hirono. Takeshi Yanagawa and Yuzo Koshiro scored the game.
